CustomField.description: used in flow "Merchant - Bulk TC management optimized" for choice set "Choice_Set_Reason_Stop_BC" multi picklist values cannot be used because values are too long (>40 char)
CustomField.label: Reason to stop Back Care

value.fullName: The Quality isn’t what I expected
value.label: The Quality isn’t what I expected

value.fullName: I think agents refund and return too many orders
value.label: I think agents refund and return too many orders

value.fullName: I hired someone to handle customer requests in this country
value.label: I hired someone to handle customer requests in this country

value.fullName: I will use another provider to handle customer requests
value.label: I will use another provider to handle customer requests

value.fullName: Back Care isn’t working well with other Back Market services
value.label: Back Care isn’t working well with other Back Market services

value.fullName: I am not happy with the support provided by Back Market
value.label: I am not happy with the support provided by Back Market

value.fullName: I signed for a translation service and I don’t want to outsource
value.label: I signed for a translation service and I don’t want to outsource
